97  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
98  eternity::xml_archive fa;
99  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
100  xml_serialize(fa, "");
101  fa.close();
102  }
103 
104  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
105  eternity::xml_archive fa;
106  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
107  xml_serialize(fa, "");
108  fa.close();
109  }
110 
111  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive& xml, const char *p) {
112  char buffer[1024];
113 
114  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mBuffer", p);
115  mBuffer.xml_serialize(xml, buffer);
116 
117  if (xml.is_loading()) {
118 
119  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mWinSize", p);
120  xml.read(buffer, mWinSize, 0);
121  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
122  xml.read(buffer, mOrder, 0);
123  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mLambda", p);
124  xml.read(buffer, mLambda, 0);
125  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSigma", p);
126  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mSigma, xml, buffer);
127  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mNorm", p);
128  BOOL_XML_SERIALIZE(mNorm, xml, buffer);
129  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSigma0", p);
130  xml.read(buffer, mSigma0, 0);
131  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStartTime", p);
132  xml.read(buffer, mStartTime, 0);
133  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSampling", p);
134  xml.read(buffer, mSampling, 0);
135  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mFirstCall", p);
136  BOOL_XML_SERIALIZE(mFirstCall, xml, buffer);
137  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEF", p);
138  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEF, xml, buffer);
139  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEB", p);
140  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEB, xml, buffer);
141  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEpf", p);
142  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEpf, xml, buffer);
143  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEpb", p);
144  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEpb, xml, buffer);
145  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKf", p);
146  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKf, xml, buffer);
147  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKb", p);
148  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKb, xml, buffer);
149  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mNG", p);
150  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mG, xml, buffer);
151  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mF0", p);
152  xml.read(buffer, mF0, 0);
153 
154  } else {
155 
156  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mWinSize", p);
157  xml.write(buffer, mWinSize);
158  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
159  xml.write(buffer, mOrder);
160  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mLambda", p);
161  xml.write(buffer, mLambda);
162  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSigma", p);
163  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mSigma, xml, buffer);
164  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mNorm", p);
165  BOOL_XML_SERIALIZE(mNorm, xml, buffer);
166  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSigma0", p);
167  xml.write(buffer, mSigma0);
168  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStartTime", p);
169  xml.write(buffer, mStartTime);
170  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSampling", p);
171  xml.write(buffer, mSampling);
172  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mFirstCall", p);
173  BOOL_XML_SERIALIZE(mFirstCall, xml, buffer);
174  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEF", p);
175  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEF, xml, buffer);
176  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEB", p);
177  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEB, xml, buffer);
178  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEpf", p);
179  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEpf, xml, buffer);
180  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEpb", p);
181  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEpb, xml, buffer);
182  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKf", p);
183  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKf, xml, buffer);
184  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKb", p);
185  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKb, xml, buffer);
186  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mNG", p);
187  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mG, xml, buffer);
188  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mF0", p);
189  xml.write(buffer, mF0);
190 
191 
192  }
193  }

201 
210  void operator<<(SeqViewDouble& Data) {
211  Dmatrix* in = Data.GetData();
212 
213  if (in->size1() != 1) {
214  LogSevere("LSLfilter: multichannels not implemented resize");
215  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
216  }
217 
218  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
219 
220  if (mFirstCall) {
221  mFirstCall = false;
222  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
223  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
224  }
225  }
226 
227  void operator>>(SeqViewDouble& outdata) {
228  Dmatrix *out = outdata.GetData();
229  out->resize(1, mWinSize);
230  GetData(*out);
231  outdata.SetStart(mStartTime);
232  outdata.SetSampling(mSampling);
233  outdata.SetScale(1.0);
234  mStartTime += mSampling*mWinSize;
235  }
236 
237  //for the online process
238 
247  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& Data, SeqViewDouble& outdata) {
248  Dmatrix* in = Data.GetData();
249 
250  if (in->size1() != 1) {
251  LogSevere("LSLfilter: multichannels not implemented resize");
252  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
253  }
254 
255  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
256 
257  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
258  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
259 
260 
261  Dmatrix *out = outdata.GetData();
262  out->resize(1, mWinSize);
263  GetData(*out);
264  outdata.SetStart(Data.GetStart());
265  outdata.SetSampling(Data.GetSampling());
266  outdata.SetScale(1.0);
267 
268  }
